words.English: What would you like to drink?
words.Yale: Néih séung yám māt yéh ā

words.English: I'd like a cup of coffee.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi ga fē
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi kāfēi

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of water.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi séui
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi shuǐ

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of ice water.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi bīng séui
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi bīng shuǐ

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of cola.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi hó lohk
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi kě lè

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of Pepsi.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi baak sih
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi bǎi shì kě lè

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of red wine.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi hùhng jáu
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi hóng jiǔ

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of white wine.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi baahk jáu
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi bái jiǔ

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of beer.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi bē jáu
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi pí jiǔ

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of milk.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi ngàuh náai
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi niú nǎ

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of orange juice.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi cháang jāp
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi chéng zhī

words.English: I'd like a cup (or glass) of grape juice.
words.Yale: ngóh séung yiu yāt būi pòuh tòuh jāp
words.Pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi pú táo zhī
